00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <map>
00010 #include <string>
00011 #include <fstream>
00012 #include <sstream>
00013 #include <cstring>
00014 #include "lsf/basic/macro.hpp"
00015 #include "lsf/basic/type_cast.hpp"
00016 #include "lsf/basic/singleton.hpp"
00017 #include "lsf/basic/error.hpp"
00018 #include "lsf/util/string_ext.hpp"
00019 
00020 namespace lsf {
00021 namespace util {
00022 
00024 // Config
00025 class Config : public lsf::basic::Error {
00026 public:
00027     using map_type = std::map<std::string, std::string>;
00028     using store_type = std::map<std::string, map_type>;
00029 
00030     constexpr static const char * DEF_DELIMIT = " \t=";
00031     constexpr static const char * DEF_COMMENT = "#";
00032     constexpr static const char * DEF_MODULE_NAME = "__anonymous__";
00033 
00034 public:
00035     Config(std::string const& filename = "", char const * delimit = DEF_DELIMIT, char const * comment = DEF_COMMENT)
00036         : _delimit(delimit), _comment(comment) {
00037         if (!filename.empty()) ParseFromFile(filename);
00038     }
00039 
00040     // member funcs
00041     bool ParseFromFile(std::string const& filename) {
00042         std::fstream fs;
00043         fs.open(filename.c_str(), std::ios::in);
00044 
00045         if (!fs.is_open()) {
00046             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + SysErrString());
00047             return false;
00048         }
00049         fs >> *this;
00050         return true;
00051     }
00052 
00053     bool ParseFromString(std::string const& input) {
00054         std::istringstream input_stream(input + "\n");
00055         input_stream >> *this;
00056         return true;
00057     }
00058 
00059     std::string Get(std::string const& module, std::string const& key) const {
00060         store_type::const_iterator module_iter = _data.find(module);
00061         if (module_iter == _data.end()) return "";
00062 
00063         map_type::const_iterator val_iter = module_iter->second.find(key);
00064         if (val_iter == module_iter->second.end()) return "";
00065 
00066         return val_iter->second;
00067     }
00068 
00069     std::string Get(std::string const& key) const { return Get(DEF_MODULE_NAME, key); }
00070 
00071     template <typename OutType>
00072     OutType Get(std::string const& module, std::string const& key) {
00073         return basic::TypeCast<OutType>(Get(module, key));
00074     }
00075 
00076     template <typename OutType>
00077     OutType Get(std::string const& key) {
00078         return Get<OutType>(DEF_MODULE_NAME, key);
00079     }
00080 
00081     // accessor
00082     void SetDelimit(std::string const& delimit) { _delimit = delimit; }
00083     void SetComment(std::string const& comment) { _comment = comment; }
00084 
00085     size_t size() const { return _size; }
00086 
00087     // other func
00088     void PrintAll(std::ostream& os) {
00089         for (store_type::const_iterator map_iter = _data.begin(); map_iter != _data.end(); map_iter++) {
00090             for (map_type::const_iterator val_iter = map_iter->second.begin(); val_iter != map_iter->second.end();
00091                  val_iter++) {
00092                 os << map_iter->first << "\t\t" << val_iter->first << "\t\t" << val_iter->second << std::endl;
00093             }
00094         }
00095     }
00096 
00097     void Clear() {
00098         _size = 0;
00099         _delimit = DEF_DELIMIT;
00100         _comment = DEF_COMMENT;
00101         _data.clear();
00102     }
00103 
00104     friend std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, Config& cf);
00105 
00106 private:
00107     // internal variables
00108     size_t _size = 0;
00109     std::string _delimit = DEF_DELIMIT;
00110     std::string _comment = DEF_COMMENT;
00111     store_type _data;
00112 };
00113 
00115 // parse config from is
00116 inline std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, Config& cf) {
00117     std::string line;
00118     std::string module = Config::DEF_MODULE_NAME;
00119 
00120     for (; !is.eof(); std::getline(is, line)) {
00121         size_t pos1, pos2;
00122 
00123         // find and remove comments
00124         if ((pos1 = line.find(cf._comment)) != std::string::npos) line.erase(pos1);
00125 
00126         // remove heading and tailing white spaces
00127         util::StringExt::RemoveHeadWhitespace(line);
00128         util::StringExt::RemoveTailWhitespace(line);
00129 
00130         // ignore empty line
00131         if (line.empty()) continue;
00132 
00133         // case1, this is a module declare
00134         if (*line.begin() == '[' && *(--line.end()) == ']') {
00135             module = std::string(line.begin() + 1, line.end() - 1);
00136             continue;
00137         }
00138 
00139         // case2, this is a config
00140         pos1 = line.find_first_of(cf._delimit);
00141         pos2 = line.find_last_of(cf._delimit);
00142         if (pos1 == std::string::npos || pos1 == 0 || pos2 == std::string::npos || pos2 == line.size() - 1) {
00143             continue;
00144         }
00145         cf._data[module][line.substr(0, pos1)] = line.substr(pos2 + 1);
00146 
00147         cf._size++;
00148     }
00149 
00150     return is;
00151 };
00152 
00154 // Singleton Config, provide macros for convient access
00155 class SingleConfig : public Config, public lsf::basic::Singleton<SingleConfig> {};
00156 
00157 }  // end of namespace util
00158 }  // end of namespace lsf
